name: Language and Gender
description: An introduction to the research on differences between women and men in how they use language and how they behave in conversational interaction, together with an examination of the role of language in reflecting and perpetuating cultural attitudes towards gender.  Same as LINC28H3
prerequisites: WSTA01H3 or WSTA03H3, and one full credit at the B-level in ANT, LIN, SOC or WST
